__e: Someone beat a girl to death. Your job is to find him.
Listen... you dropped by her place at 3:00 and caught her with a cop.
My dad killed her with a hammer when she was asleep, then shot himself in the backyard.
Hm. So now I just wait till he is slain.
We found her skull three weeks ago, and by examining it, we can tell that somebody clubbed her to death. Wow.
The bludgeoning victim 30 years ago, didn't he have two kids?
